name: xpss

stmt.origin: mp2an(wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)), wss(c0, universe), wss(c1, universe))
stmt.pretty: mp2an((c0 × c1)⊆(𝕌 × 𝕌), c0 ⊆ 𝕌, c1 ⊆ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe))
-| wss(c0, universe)
-| wss(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wss(c0, universe), wss(c1, universe)), wss(cxp(c0, c1), cxp(universe, universe)))

comment: A Cartesian product is included in the ordered pair universe. Exercise 3 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 25. (Contributed by NM, 2-Aug-1994.)
